actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1081.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to change the period for the payment of certain taxes.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1081) Amends the Internal Revenue Code to change the period for the payment of the manufacturers excise tax imposed on the sale of fishing equipment. Provides that the tax on such equipment sold during quarters ending on December 31, March 31, and June 30 is payable, respectively, on March 31, June 30, and September 24. Specifies that articles sold during the quarter ending September 30, shall be due at such time as the Secretary of the Treasury may by regulation prescribe.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to change the period for the payment of certain taxes.
